prompts: Create a playful monkey-like Pokemon with a long tail and bright purple fur.
Imagine a Normal-type Pokemon that has a mischievous grin and a distinct hand on its tail.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small primate, perfect for treetop adventures.
Generate a cute character with oversized ears and a vibrant color palette for a kid-friendly game.
Design a Pokemon that embodies agility and curiosity, with a fluffy tail and expressive eyes.
Make a friendly creature that loves to swing from branches and has a hint of yellow on its paws.
Give me an adorable monkey Pokemon that can climb trees and has a playful personality.

distinctive_features: Long tail with a hand-like end
